title: archetypal neon sign font
content:
Hi, I’m looking for a font to make a neon sign from, is there one that resembles the sign in Cocktail or something like it?

Thanks!

 [‹ Someone tells me It is Simoncini Garamond](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205033931/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43790 "Go to previous forum topic") [Totally stumped on this one . . . ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205033931/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43754 "Go to next forum topic")
author: hungrymoon
